Protocols/NibLoadable.html#/s:16Move4Mob.name: loadFromNib()
Protocols/NibLoadable.html#/s:16Move4Mob.abstract: Load a view from a nib file. Make sure the nib file has the exact same name.

Protocols/NibLoadable.html#/s:16Move4Mob.name: add(toView:aboveView:)
Protocols/NibLoadable.html#/s:16Move4Mob.abstract: Adds the view from the nib as a fullscreen view to a view. It matches the size of the parent.

Protocols/ReusableView.html#/s:16Move4Mo.name: reuseIdentifier
Protocols/ReusableView.html#/s:16Move4Mo.abstract: The reuseidentifier of this cell. Make sure your cell in Storyboard/Nib has the exact same reuse identifier as the class name.

Protocols/StoryboardLoadable.html#/s:16M.name: storyboardInstance()
Protocols/StoryboardLoadable.html#/s:16M.abstract: Get a storyboard instance of the view controller.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC16Mo.name: roundCorners(_:radius:)
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC16Mo.abstract: Round only certain corners of a UIView.

Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC16Mo.name: removeAllSubviews()
Extensions/UIView.html#/s:So6UIViewC16Mo.abstract: Remove all the subviews from a UIView.

Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:So7UIColorC16.name: init(rgba:)
Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:So7UIColorC16.abstract: Init a UIColor with a hex code, including the #.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS16Move4Mobil.name: height(withConstrainedWidth:font:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS16Move4Mobil.abstract: Get the height of the text contraint to a certain width and when used with a certain font.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS16Move4Mobil.name: width(withConstraintedHeight:font:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS16Move4Mobil.abstract: Get the width of the text contraint to a certain height and when used with a certain font.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS16Move4Mobil.name: isEmail
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS16Move4Mobil.abstract: Check if a string contains a valid e-mailaddress.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS16Move4Mobil.name: isPhoneNumber
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS16Move4Mobil.abstract: Check if a string contains a valid phonenumber.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS16Move4Mobil.name: isNumeric
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS16Move4Mobil.abstract: Check if a string contains a number.

Extensions/UIToolbar.html#/s:So9UIToolba.name: keyboardBar(withAction:)
Extensions/UIToolbar.html#/s:So9UIToolba.abstract: Get a simple toolbar with done button to attach to your keyboard.

Classes/Alert.html#/s:16Move4MobileTools.name: show(withMessage:inViewController:)
Classes/Alert.html#/s:16Move4MobileTools.abstract: Show an alert with one button and without a title.

Classes/Alert.html#/s:16Move4MobileTools.name: show(withTitle:message:inViewController:)
Classes/Alert.html#/s:16Move4MobileTools.abstract: Show an alert with one button and an optional title.

Classes/Alert.html#/s:16Move4MobileTools.name: show(withTitle:message:inViewController:_:)
Classes/Alert.html#/s:16Move4MobileTools.abstract: Show an alert with one button and triggers a callback method.

Classes/Alert.html#/s:16Move4MobileTools.name: distructiveAlert(withTitle:message:inViewController:_:)
Classes/Alert.html#/s:16Move4MobileTools.abstract: Show an alert with an ok and red cancel button, and triggers a callback method.

Classes/Device.html#/s:16Move4MobileTool.name: screenWidth
Classes/Device.html#/s:16Move4MobileTool.abstract: Get the screen width of the device.

Classes/Device.html#/s:16Move4MobileTool.name: screenHeight
Classes/Device.html#/s:16Move4MobileTool.abstract: Get the screen height of the device.
